sn1.26:1: v.65"How many sources of light are in the worldBy means of which the world is illumined?We have come to ask the Blessed One this:How are we to understand it?"
sn1.26:2: v.66"There are four sources of light in the world;A fifth one is not found here.The sun shines by day,The moon glows at night,
sn1.26:3: v.67And fire flares up here and thereBoth by day and at night.But the Buddha is the best of those that shine:He is the light unsurpassed."
